Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen; created 16.10.2001
18.04.2014 JH SCR18801 Changed update of BTCH_ADMNO

Store BATCH-row
08.03.2006 AK SCR10583 add range INVO_CODDRAFT = N in task "table INVOICE"
18.01.2006 SH SCR10034 Added test DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION = N if GNRL_CODE = NL
22.06.2004 JJ moved SCR3627 comment to change history in RM
22.06.2004 JJ SCR6472 fixed garbage from removal of GNRL_NPAYSAUTOBATCH check
16.04.2004 SH SCR3627 Extended argument list for BPH112, see SCR for details
13.04.2004 EE SCR#5948 added parameter and cndrange
13.04.2004 EE SCR#5948 new parameter and changed selection rules
07.10.2003 SH SCR4479 Updated BTCP_LINENO with BTCH_BTCP_LASTLINENO +1
- before BTCH_BTCP_LASTLINENO was updated with +1, see SCR for details
05.06.2003 RR -> SCR3691 Removed test to close current batch and create a new
24-04-2003 JP changes according to new specs
//24-04-2003 JP SCR #3411 changes according to new specs
a) new init fields in BTCH
b) change param to BPH113
c) call BPH250 asynchronically
d) change param list to be used as submit
20.02.2003 JJ SCR3037 additional init BTCH
10.09.2002 SH Changed list of arguments for BPH113 according to new SPECS
10.06.2002 JJ BPH250 reenabled
06.06.02 JJ !!!!BPH250 disabled for test!!!
06/07.06.2002 JJ SCR1221 Cont. added locate to link in FetchBooked..+pars BPH113
21.05.2002 JJ SCR1221 -Cont. addded task FetchBookedAmount + call BPH113
-changed arguments call BPH250 to alpha numeric
-Changed transaction handling:
-this task no transaction, no lock
-task table INVOICE transaction start before record prefix, immediate lock
-Added virtual to track BTCP_LINENO on DEBC level, BTCP written for first
invoice found per debc
-Added logical flag v.BookBatch to trigger booking of batches on DEBC level
19.02.2002 JJ SCR856 implemented new field BTCH_HYPB_BATCHNO
-- Start booking
//24-04-2003 JP changes according to new specs
reset BTCP_LINENO for each DEBC
WHERE CLAUS
